template.subject: Request for Coverage: Iran Human Rights Crisis
template.body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

I am writing from {{senderCountry}} to request increased coverage of the humanitarian crisis in Iran.

Since 28 December 2025:
â€¢ Over 51 protesters have been killed by Iranian security forces
â€¢ More than 2,270 people have been detained
â€¢ A nationwide internet blackout has been imposed
â€¢ Live ammunition has been used against peaceful demonstrators

German media, particularly Deutsche Welle's Persian Service, plays a crucial role in reaching Iranian audiences directly. Your coverage can:

1. Inform Iranians about what is happening in other cities
2. Document human rights violations for the international record
3. Give voice to protesters and their families
4. Keep international attention on the crisis

I kindly request that you continue and expand coverage of this developing situation.

With sincere thanks,
A concerned citizen from {{senderCountry}}

targetingRationale.en: Deutsche Welle's Persian Service reaches millions inside Iran. German media is trusted internationally and can influence EU policy discussions.
